title: Great workwear!
text: My boss told us on a Friday that Monday, we would be starting to dress professionally in the front office. (We typically only wore scrubs.) I immediately logged into shein and bought 4 pairs of shoes, 4 pants and 5 tops for $189. Got the shipment Monday. (Expedited shipping.) I’ve gotten SO MANY COMPLIMENTS! In scrubs, I looked sloppy. In these clothes, I look polished. One coworker said I looked like I had walked straight out of a magazine. Even my confidence is up. I’m not a tiny person (size 12 pants and Large tops.) I did return a couple pants which were refunded promptly. Just not the right look for me. And it’s important to buy a size up in shoes if you’re in America because everything comes from China and the shoes run small. I will say though, I even went back later and purchased more clothes and jewelry. Love love LOVE this app. I’ve bought things for my 7 and 9 year old girls here too!

title: Love It Here!  I gave you 4.3 star rating
text: I absolutely love their kids clothing and prices . Everything I’ve ordered thus far has been just as described on the site. The plus clothing are very fashionable and accurate to size. And I really love that there are colors and prints of many different choice in the plus sizes. The ordering process is simple and easy to maneuver through. If I had to say anything negative at all it would only be about the way several packages are stuffed in a box all together and that some of the wall decor and jewelry got bent/damaged during the delivery process. But even those things were minor and easy to repair. Overall I’m totally obsessed with this store and have and will continue to shop here for as long as I can afford to. P.S. The coupons are insane savings on already low affordable priced  products . Thanks SHEIN I absolutely LOVE IT HERE!!!!!!!

title: Shein & benefits
text: Shein is a really good app in my opinion there are many benefits in the app that not many people notice or know right away. For example they do free trials for their clothing, this is when they show a bunch of clothing items and you can choose up to 3 each week and if you get approved they get mailed to your home for free and all you have to do is wright a detailed review with picture images of the clothing item to help better the company. They also have a daily check in where you earn points which helps for you to get a discount on clothing items. The app also provided many coupons making the overall total very nicely priced. The clothing here are cute and comfortable and all have reviews for you to view and see how well their clothing or other items are. They also have more then just clothes they have room decorations, hair care tools, accessories, bed sets, etc.

title: Obsessed
text: I am absolutely obsessed with this app! It’s my go to! I’m practically addicted. Everyday I’m either putting something new in my cart or saving it to my favorites for when I’m ready to check out. I love that they have afterpay and other similar payment methods. If I had to say anything negative about it it would be that if I don’t order right away sometimes items I really like go out of stock. I probably have close to a hundred swim suits from them now and atleast half my wardrobe is now things I’ve bought from SHEIN.  Check the reviews tho because some things are cheaply made but If they are cheaply made they are definitely cheaply priced so it’s not much of a loss. I also have many great quality elegant dresses from SHEIN that I absolutely adore and have gotten so so many compliments on! I love SHEIN.

title: Exactly What I'm looking for, except...
text: I LOVE this app. I am a very tiny and petite (tall-ish) 13 year old. I have SO much trouble finding things that I like. Because I am tiny, I still have to shop in girl sections at stores. I don't mind that except, all the stuff is really girly, and cheesy. I have two type of clothes in my closet, 1. Big clothes that meet my style but not my size; 2. Stuff that fits me, but is super girly and not really my style. But when I was searching through clothes apps, I found this one! I just got it today, but it looks perfect. All the stuff is my style AND my size! I do have to admit this though, some of this stuff is kind of inappropriate. There are REALLY short shorts and some really revealing halter tops. I just think they should have more t shirts and longer shorts.  I haven't ordered anything yet, so I can't give an unbiased opinion about the sizes but, I'm excited to order and wear the clothes! Thank you!!

title: Terrible customer service
text: I ordered back in June, and my items arrived in July, which was expected. I knew it would be a hit or miss with the items, and wanted to return the clothes I didn’t like. I mailed my packed with the provided label a couple days later, and the tracking information never updated. I have contacted my post office and they don’t have any updates either. I have contacted SheIn, and I gave them the confirmation order number, the tracking information, and then they close the conversation because there’s nothing else they could do! I tried contacting them three times and just gave up because they kept telling me the same thing where I’ll get a refund once they receive the package, even though I’m pretty sure it’s lost somewhere, but that’s not even my fault. I basically wasted about $60 of clothes I don’t even wear, and I’m going to probably just donate to Goodwill. The clothes can sometimes be cute and wearable a handful of times, and other times they are straight up trash. The quality can be so awful, but hey, you get what you pay for.

title: i love it !!
text: SHEIN has the most cute, trendy clothing! It has gained popularity by it being so called, ‘Fast Fashion’ which is cute and sometimes amazing material for the price! Usually the shirts are a little bad quality but the sweatshirts and sweatpants quality feels really similar to anything you find at other stores, for sometimes at least triple the price on SHEIN as you can get a sweatshirt for only 10 dollars in good material! I usually read most of the reviews on recommendations and size fits so if I may have to size down, there’s information I can use. Most of the people buying clothes in my size are usually minors, (like me) but some people happen to not understand good material or not, but I usually look at the top ratings in my language. I hope this review helped for some people or other minors like me who like these trendy, new style clothing for all ages!!

title: My thought on this app
text: I like this app I didn’t like going out and looking for what I wanted I like it’s gets delivered to my door step it’s a lot of time that I don’t have to walk around looking for nice clothes and I can find stuff for just about anything and it’s just convenient I don’t have to take time out of my day to find things that would wast gas so I save shopping online with this app so I can spend more on her to I think you should give this app a shot and you won’t be disappointed just remember to look at what size ever this is twice I’ve messed up the size ones or or twice because I wasn’t paying attention but I retreated it and got the right size no problem just keep the bag it comes in and you be fine full refund or different size if they have it

title: Not worth it
text: The cheap prices and cute styles drew me in. I purchased 5 items (2 of which can’t be returned due to their poor return policy) on March 28th. It’s now going on 3 weeks and I have yet to receive my purchases nor has the tracking info been updated in a week. I went thru the prompts to contact customer service and there is none. It redirects you to text your questions and concerns with a robot who just repeats the automated answers that are on the previous screen “commonly asked questions.” I followed the prompts that are to help you if your packages never arrive and there is no end solution. It takes you in circles. My assumption at this point is this: IF my packages don’t ever arrive, I’m out of the money already paid, there is no direct way to get a refund nor a department that you can speak with. And IF the package does arrive, I’m extremely concerned with the product quality only making this whole situation a domino affect of nothing short of poor customer service and bad business dealings. I regret purchasing from this company! Never again!!

title: PRICES CHANGE when you add your address!!!
text: I understand after you add your address some coupons may not be available. Of course they don’t tell you until you have almost done placing your order and bombarded with coupons and promotions you cannot use. But what concerned me the most is when I add my address they not only removed my coupons but also RAISED the prices of most of the pieces that I was buying. So with the original price and almost $17 usd discount I was supposed to pay around $96. I end up paying around $126 with a $3 discount and realized after I paid and double checked my order that most prices were different than advertised before. Even the free express shipping offer was gone. I think the address must be asked before so you can get the real prizes of your country instead of changing them right after you add your payment method. Still kept the order to check if the quality still worth it but not very happy already. Will update after I received my order.

title: Frustrating customer service
text: I know this is a drop shipping store that has been around for 10 years or so. So you’d think they know the business or be good at customer service by now. I ordered two items same day but different times and when it came for them to be delivered they never came. They were delivered on different days and both the app and post office tracking say they were delivered but no one has seen them. And i was home at the time of both deliveries and was checking for them and I doubt they were stolen. They tell me to go through the post office to confirm that they are missing which I have and still no willingness to give a refund or re-ship my items. I like this store but I will be taking a break from shopping here and hopefully things will go a bit smoother the next time I decide to order from here again. It’s an online drop shipping store and items are coming from China so yes they do get lost and that’s just what they have to deal with. Business as usual.

title: A Must Shop, Shop
text: I have never been so obsessed with a clothing store in my entire life! I do huge hauls every few months. I wear the outfits to work, on a lazy day in, church or even on a night out on the town. My coworkers have now joined in on shopping at SHEIN! I order from there so much and people love the clothes so much that I’ve been given money and asked to shop for other people! SHEIN is where it’s at! A huge plus is that I can shop for everyone from there; from the kids to friends, my brother and even my Mother, who is a plus sized diva! The arrival time for shipment is quick and having the app is awesome! Writing review on the pieces I order gives me points that I can use on future purchases! I absolutely love SHEIN! The only thing I question is whether it’s pronounced SHEIN (like sheen) or SHE-IN (like she in) lol.

title: Wonderful app/site
text: I love the site in general. Delivery time has been quicker than usual. Sometimes within a week or in about 10 days which is far more better than other sites I’ve ordered from in the past. Support is amazing too. If I really need to get response from someone else, they are very helpful. Prices are amazing. Only complaint about the app is I have to actually click on the item from my wishlist and unLOVE/unClick the heart button to remove it compared to on the browser where I can easily remove from wishlist. It would be really convenient if the same thing applied on the app or even just to be able to select multiple items on my wishlist that I want to remove considering my wishlist tends to grow in number real quick. So many things I want but need to learn to lessen lol overall, still awesome!

title: SHEIN
text:
I have bought quiet a few things from shein, such as swim suits, shirts and jeans, phone cases, stickers, and room decor. There is a trick to buying these cheap items. You might find something you really like, but if it doesn’t have any purchases, DO NOT buy it! Majority of the time the not purchased items can be sketchy. Also be sure to read reviews. Reviews reveal the truth, and look to buy items with pictures in the review so you know what you are buying. But the worst thing is the shipping time. It does ship from China, so it is going to take a while. My swim suit took 4 months to get there, so be sure to check up on your order. If it comes in late you get to have a discount. (I get free jewelry!) also there is a shipping fee for everything. But overall, it’s a 4/5 for me. Decent clothing, cheap prices, some sketchy stuff, and a long shipping time. Thank for reading all the way :) 
Here’s a cookie 🍪🍪

title: I Really Liked it so much!!
text: I recommend this app it’s easy to use and shoppe.. Free returns but keep in mind when you have points to use or coupons you will not get all the money of what the items cost. For example. If you buy a 20 dollar dress and use a coupon or points let say 5 dollars off you and you want to return a dress that cost you 20 dollars minus the 5 dollars off you will get 15 dollars back because they take your points or coupons back to them and they don't give it back to you.. Anyways at the same time you probably don't loose any money, but you loose your points and coupon that you have used in that purchase. But Shein always have coupons for us or sometimes free shipping if you shoppe at the right time.. I liked it. Have a nice day!!

title: It’s your all-time best best option!!!
text: Shein has always been the online shopping app or store that I go to. It has such cute stuff, and it is set so that if you’re a kid, you can get stuff, but if you’re an older teen trying to dress more like an adult, they provide that for you and it makes me feel so mature and makes me looks it too! I have bought at least 40 items from them, and only one thing has been broken: a claw clip that was small, but it’s okay because it was only bought for $1.50! Anyways I totally recommend anybody Shein, they have such a wide variety of stuff you can buy, and it has more organizational tools and items that I’ve ever seen on just one online shopping site. Please make this y’all’s #1 shopping app. I promise it won’t let you down.

title: Hollywood set clothes?
text: I feel like SHEIN got started by making clothes to look expensive but are not for movie sets. Many of the materials are thinner than they appear for example but you can’t really tell unless you’re wearing it. I love that for hot weather! The style and fit are usually pretty good. If you read the reviews it’s easier to tell how it will fit you. Perfect for people who don’t have a lot of money but don’t want to look it. Thinner fabrics means good for layering and creating looks that are fun and inexpensive. I wish I had SHEIN when I was in high school. Also they have so much more for the household and grooming and surprising great quality! I always look to see if I can get what I need here first before I head to the store. I’m just hoping SHEIN employees are treated good in the process.

title: i love it but some materials are iffy
text: i get most of my clothes from shein and i LOVE every single one of them. but i do recommend buying comfortable clothing a size up because most things can be a bit snug. but their jeans are great! and i’m in love with their sweatshirts and sweatpants but as i said i order them a size bigger and they are SO comfy. i love shein so much and it is so affordable and easy. and a plus is shipping doesn’t take too long either (depending on how much you buy) but i would say the most i’ve ever had to wait is around a week and a half. i would 10/10 recommend shein to anyone just remember that some materials are different and you just have to go off of judging. i also love their jewelry!! so cute and low price. there are so many different varieties of things on shein and there’s always something for everyone. i love it!!

title: Mid 50’s & Shop on Shein
text: So…. I literally just found this gem of an online shopping place. Even though everyone I told about it so far… had known for quite some time. Anyway— in the past few months I’ve order several hundred dollars worth of clothing from gowns to jeans and shirts and night wear and undies— oh and several bathing suits ! Everything has exceeded my expectations plus fit like a glove (I do read reviews and look thru pics to decide what size would be best for me) Everything has been well made with desirable fabrics. Again… I do look closely at reviews and zoom in on both advertising pics and customer review pics to make sure it is indeed the fabric I’d like and the color as well. This site is not only all of the above for-mentioned, but the pricing is incredible.

title: Plus sized approved!
text: As a fat girl I hate shopping in stores. Places like target and Walmart don’t sell cute things in plus sizes. When I found SHEIN I was skeptical because everything was so cheep. I finally decided to make my first order about a year ago and I’m so glad I did. I love it! There are so many options for all body shapes and sizes and they keep up with trends.  It’s also really affordable and not bad quality. Returning items that don’t fit or you don’t like is also easy and fast. The only down side is things do sell out fast and once they sell out they don’t restock that item they just make a new one for its place. So if you like something get it quick before it’s gone. To wrap this up, SHEIN has really boosted my confidence and made buying clothing and accessories exciting!

title: Got To Love Shein!
text: I am currently a senior in highschool and my first day starts on Monday, I haven’t really dressed the best in my school years and I want to end it out on a bang. Shopping with shein is so Easy everything is so easy to access. Simple menu. Clothes are great! Sometimes the quality is a little bit thin than other places but you got to think about it this way, the clothes are Sold at a low price. A lower price then you would find anywhere else it feels like, but it’s still good quality so you can’t complain much about it. Everything fits well, most things are true to size. They have a Vast variety of styles to suit anyone. It’s just a perfect app for shopping for clothing digitally. Thanks to shein I am able to leave the house confidently so, THANK YOU SHEIN! You got a Customer in me❤️🫡

title: SHEIN IS AWESOME FOR THE PRICE <33
text: Okay shein is awesome I think because they only charge 3 dollars for shipping which isn’t that bad compared to other apps and they are cheap if you don’t wanna spend a lot of money or don’t have it then shein is perfect for you and they have tons of stuff and when I  have ordered the past five times I haven’t had a bad order or even if you do you can return it and leave an bad review and then you can get you’re money back also again with the prices they have points you can earn by creating outfits I know it might sound weird or they have other things you can do to earn points and the points can used for you’re order and they have discounts 24/7 so it would be like 15% off and other things but it’s really awesome I’d say download it!

title: Awesome APP!
text: Although, at my age (79), I can’t or choose not to wear all the different styles, Shein offers, I do love them all. Young people must be in heaven with all the choices. I just received nine different tops that I purchased for sleep. As I opened the packages and eyeballed the tops I decided that I will not wear them for sleep. They are perfect for wearing in the summer as a summer top or under a jacket. They are well made, fit perfect. The material is very nice, especially for the price. I just can’t say enough nice things about them. I will be placing many orders on many different items. I ordered these tops to kinda check their quality , etc. I have to say I am so pleased with them. I highly recommend anything you purchase from them. Their clothes are different looking and hard to find anywhere else.

title: I was skeptical at first and so worth the money.
text: I haven’t returned anything yet but I really like shein I don’t have to go in person to get clothes and wait in a long line. They have really cute affordable clothes and I’m sure it’s easy to return if need be. I been lucky enough to order my size correctly. I also read about the outfit before buying. It’s worth the money in my opinion. I like how you can earn points to buy reviewing items you purchase and earn points depending on how much you spend. It has clothes for everyone weather that’s children, men, women, and plus size. I like that it’s not just clothes it’s everything like makeup, household items, apparels, shoes, etc. They also have coupons you can use I like spending the 2.99 to save a little more it’s worth the money.

title: Love the clothes - read the reviews!
text:
SHEIN is my favorite shopping app. I’ve purchased several items and have been thrilled with all of them. Reading the reviews and seeing pictures of the clothing on women with all body types helps me get a good idea of what the item will look like on me. That’s a huge bonus considering you don’t get a fitting room with online purchases! 

I used to work for a distributor for a high-end boutique chain, and some of the EXACT pieces we used to sell for $30, $40,$50 can be found on SHEIN for $18 or less. While it’s true that many of the items aren’t top quality, I’ve been extremely impressed by the vast majority of the things I’ve bought. A lot of their clothes are actually great quality, and again - READ THE REVIEWS. They’re invaluable. 

I love this app and love the clothes I’ve bought - give it a try!!

title: Seriously great
text: I not only buy my own clothes from SHEIN but my daughters as well. I’ve also purchased clothes and accessories as gifts and been very happy with all my purchases. The only thing I would suggest improving is the shipping and sizes. What I mean is that a lot of the sizes run small or large. For example I purchased school clothes for my daughter and most of them were fine but some tops and the shoes ran smaller than usual yet the bathing suit I purchased was way too big. Never had a problem with shipping time or lost items but I have definitely gotten my packages on spaced out into different days instead of receiving one single parcel with everything in it. I know this can be said for many sites but that’s pretty much one of the only inconveniences. Overall my favorite clothing site to be quite honest. Amazing sales, insanely great selection, very fashionable, and super user friendly!

title: This app is AMAZING!
text: I LOVE SHEIN! I ordered 15 pieces of clothing from this app and so far I love it. All of my clothes came very fast and the prices are very affordable. It was faster shipping than expected, so I had to put my package on hold so I can make it back to my house to receive my package (I was on vacation). If you are in a similar situation you should do a live chat on the SHEIN customer service, it might take a while though. DO NOT: submit a ticket, I have tried doing this and have gotten no response. So if you are having problems and need to modify your package delivery details, then do a live chat with the SHEIN customer service. Also make sure to DO YOUR MEASUREMENTS, DO NOT ESTIMATE this way you will get what fits you. I recommend reading all the reviews so you will get a better understanding of what you are buying. This was truly worth every bit of my money.

title: Depends
text: Personally I’m a younger shopper of Shein, meaning I’m not loaded with money so this is a perfect sight for many. However SHEIN is know for many issues, which I’m not sure if it is correct or not but from see what others say it’s not good. BUT. From my experience it’s pretty great, obviously you get what you pay-for, it’s cheap clothing. Honestly I’ve never had a huge problem with shein all my clothes fit even some jewelry. Ok so for the clothing most of them are Polysphere based but actually feel pretty good I’ve washed all and have came out perfectly fine, I’ve worn them multiple times and no strings are lose. Jewelry is different because it’s costume jewelry meaning it will change color after a while to a dirty brass. But besides that I would say go for it and spend your money here.

title: Good App
text:
Would rate 5 stars if they bring back the filter for size and color when looking for customer reviews.
Overall not a bad app. 

You get what you pay for. Cheap prices for cheap clothes but they are in style and cute. Have had hits and misses for my slim petite athletic teenager as well as myself, I’m on the curvy side of Shein. Have gotten the wrong color shoes and earrings that don’t match the picture color. Sizing was off. So do keep that in mind. It will happen! Wish the return process was simpler or I’d have made even more returns for wrong items sent or items that were too large even following the Shein measurements. Definitely read the reviews and those customers measurements and search for pics to see the fit. They could be your height and weight but carry their weight differently than you. So the pics really help along with their measurements and what size they bought.

title: It’s awesome 👏🏻
text: I personally never ordered from SHEIN but my older cousins have a lot of there clothes and they say it’s very affordable and good quality and I have  a order that I was ready to pay for about $196 it’s expensive but I have to think of the quantity because I orders like twenty things and at some places that’s a total for two things the one thing I am worried about is time because my cousins say that their first order took awhile but then it happens faster but because I ordered so many things I am worried it will take longer i also worry it will come in separate parts I would love to just have them show up at the same time but it’s ok if it does not. DISCLAIMER NONE OF THIS HAS HAPPENED TO ME I HAVE NOT ORDERED ANYTHING YET. I hope everything works well for my first order and ur guys too have an awesome day to everyone and the creators.

title: ❤️ Top Tier
text: SHEIN is my go to for the whole family, if you have kids that happen to be anything like mine and are constantly outgrowing everything they own, SHEIN has the lowest priced items that beat the fashion you’ll find any side any physical stores. You get what you pay for, so for my clothing i love having the versatility of getting something super cheap to wear to a concert that I’ll probably never wear again & also being able to buy stuff I plan to wear all summer and still only pay a fraction of retail costs. Shipping time has improved so much in the last two years, packages deliver rather quickly with free shipping. The household section has so many items available I’ve never seen or heard of, that simplify or organize every room in my house. I’m sold

title: Wish 0 stars was a thing
text: I have ordered a lot from this app. My most recent orders I returned about 10 items that were extremely low quality. This return I sent was at least $70 worth (I sent it within the return timeframe). I never received a refund in my bank. I returned these pieces over a month and a half ago and was getting frustrated. Finally I saw today that my returns were “cancelled” I literally might as well have kept the crappy clothes because I basically just mailed this company back clothes and they kept my money. The “live chat” customer service is a bot that is literally no help. When you mark it as not answering your question it just says “sorry, I’ll work to be better!” I’ve spent hundreds on this app and I’m officially done. Will tell everyone I know to stay away, they send poor quality items AND steal your money when you return. Also their review system for their items are a joke, they incentivize people to rate 5 stars and if you actually read the review written under the 5* people will say the stuff is bad.

title: Sheinaholic!
text:
I used to buy in other apps a variety of items with great quality BUT once I found SHEIN?!!?!! I fell in LOVE with their products, quality, prices, sizes availability, nail products, home accessories and so much more. SHEIN offers discounts if the purchase amount is eligible and you accumulate points that can be applied as well, making the transaction very affordable. I can’t get enough, I shop for everybody in my family and myself as well, and only a few times due to items (clothes) being smaller.  I've saved so much buying through this app and will keep saving because I will NOT stop this addiction 😂  

Shein, that is for providing your consumers with amazing quality and an ample range of items to choose from and recommendations in case there's a limited amount.

title: Absolutely love this app!
text:
Great way to buy clothes that are current and trendy, or just to refresh the basics. The point system is awesome, and they always seem to have coupons available to use too! There is such a variety of products and garments, that it’s really hard NOT to find something to buy. 

The only thing I would say could use improvement is the tracking of a shipment. I got an email from SHEIN saying my delivery was delayed another day, but when I called the company that was shipping my package, they told me it would not be delayed, and that the information SHEIN had in regard to shipping wasn’t always correct. I’m not mad, I just don’t trust SHEIN’s shipment tracking and usually copy the tracking number into the website of the actual company handling the package.

title: Great clothing, accessories, etc at awesome prices
text: I started shopping on SHEIN a few months ago and fell in love with the prices and quality of their clothing. I started with a few tops for myself, and actually had to size down because they are usually made so well. In the recent weeks, I’ve been ordering Christmas gifts for family and friends. You just can’t go wrong with shirts at $4-$6 and jewelry at $1-$3 a pop. Plus, you get points for everything and there’s always a discount to be used. I’m always satisfied with my purchases and the app is very user friendly. You can even set a reminder to check in each day to receive more points, which you can use towards purchases. I’ve used about $25 in points so far. I would give 10 stars if I could. Thanks SHEIN!

title: LOVE IT :) :D

title: My #1 go-to app
text: SHEIN is amazing. I’m a plus sized girl, and I am able to find beautiful, flattering, sexy, fashion forward pieces that are not only affordable, but were made to fit MY body. These pieces aren’t just sized up, but made for plus size people. I have purchased an entire new wardrobe from SHEIN in the last year, and nearly everything has been of exceptional quality (there have been a few cheapies here and there, so just double check the reviews). Absolutely give SHEIN a try. They have everything from undies, to swimwear, to formalwear, to work appropriate clothing, to pajamas, to lingerie, to sexy flattering pieces and unique pieces. My daughter purchased a dress a few weeks ago that had wings attached to the back for $14. She’s in love with it. Haha. But really, give them a try. You won’t be disappointed

title: Perfect
text:
Shein is the perfect store for me. I find the sizes, posted for every item, are correct. I am older, and can’t shop too much, so I rely on Shein to maintain my wardrobe. They are trendy, have many styles to choose from, and have many economical designs. All of my orders over the years, have always arrived on time and fit perfectly. 

I guess I should be happy that you are carrying children’s and men’s items, as I already bought sweaters for my boys! But, I really want to shop for me, but, Shein clothes are always great, and I find that I must check out the deals for men. 

The only thing that I would recommend is to either put across an outfit that it has sold out, or stop showing it. It’s a disappointment when you click on an item, only to find out it’s gone.

title: Lost package
text: My entire 200$ package went missing, so I contacted customer service and had it exchanged and some of my items reshipped unfortunately all were not available anymore so I could only get what I could. HOWEVER since there has been no update to the shipping number and nothing has arrived. I’ve made multiple attempts to get in contact with customer service but they basically have nothing in place to help. It’s basically automated messages that have nothing to do with what your asking so it’s no help at all. So my 200$ has basically vanished, my first order went smoothly but it seems like after that they couldn’t care less. It just feels like a scam and definitely a place you should not consistently spend your money, with the amount of time you’ll have to wait and after all of that to not even receive said items is so FRAUDULENT. The low prices mean nothing if you won’t even get the package, please save your time and money and go to a more reputable website.

title: Should Be Outlawed
text:
Nanjing Lingtian Information Technology should be ashamed and exposed. 

Fast fashion isn’t a label to describe poor quality clothing. Fast fashion is a system that fuels and profits from consumers in rich countries who are so far removed from the harmful effects that they 1) don’t realize they’re happening and/or 
2) develop apathy

Environmental 

The trendy styles that SHIEN quickly produces is just as quickly tossed, but because the material used is normally polyester + nylon the pieces will take more than 200 years to return to the soil. 

These materials also have been found to contain dangerous levels of lead and other chemicals. Those working in the facilities are exposed to these chemicals day in and day out. 

People

In Channel4’s documentary, some workers were forced into 17+ hour shifts. Other workers were given $20 daily wage but would be cut to $14 if they made mistakes on the garments. Some factories will take 2/3 of their daily pay for such mistakes. 

The truth is, women have been (myself included) tricked into thinking we need new clothes, we need them now, and we deserve them at a low cost. As it’s been revealed, the cost is not low. The cost is extremely high and shows up in worker abuse (mostly women), river pollution, plastic production, chemical poison, extremely high profit margins for little investment into the people and planet that is providing the products. That’s how we get $5 swim suits. Consumer culture isn’t worth it.

title: Awesome and inexpensive !
text:
I have been a SHEIN customer for about 1.5 years and I have been satisfied from day one. If you are accurate in the size dept then you are probably ok!  Some items are better than others and ordering clothes online can be tough but overall the styles and fabric quality is good !
The delivery of the packages is usually with usps or something like that . They deliver on time so I don’t have issues with thieves.   Takes about a week or two. They will let you track your package too. 
The best part is it is VERY INEXPENSIVE.   I know!  I love to treat myself and it is always a confidence builder when you look great .  I’ve never returned anything and if it doesn’t fit or I don’t like it I give it away !   Share the wealth.     Happy in Texas !!!

Ps. I love the zip lock bags 👍

title: Wide selection of styles for all; UNBEATABLE prices!
text: I love love LOVE this online store! SHEIN has a huge selection of trendy styles for babies, kids, and women and men. I like shopping at SHEIN for myself and for my 2 year old daughter. I’m a very small sized woman (under 5ft and less than 100 pounds) so its difficult to find nice styles that I like that’ll also fit me but I’m so pleased that SHEIN has a lot to offer in my size range! Plus the prices are so incredibly low and can’t be beat. The super low prices are especially nice for me as a parent of a toddler who frequently needs new clothes as she grows out of them so quickly. I want to buy her cute and nice things to wear but it can get difficult on the wallet. So I’ve just been in a shopper’s heaven since discovering SHEIN. I highly recommend shopping at SHEIN to everyone!

title: My favorite shopping app!!!
text: SHEIN has easily become my favorite shopping app of all time. They have amazing cute styles and it is super affordable! I have bought so many things over the last year or so from SHEIN and I’ve never had a bad experience. Their sizing is perfect, they put the measurements in the description of every clothing item so it makes it a lot easier to get the right size. Shipping is super cheap and they even offer free express 4-day shipping if you spend a certain amount of money. Regular shipping is even super quick as well. I don’t think I’ve ever waited longer than 10 days to receive my order, and that was the longest I’ve ever had to wait. They are amazing. I strongly recommend this app to EVERYONE. SHEIN is definitely my favorite place to buy all of my clothes!!

title: a couple tweaks
text: While the SHEIN app overall is good, I do have some complaints about delivery. The orders are increasingly getting longer for the wait time which is slightly irritating. There was once a time where SHEIN packages took only about 4-5 days to arrive in the mail. To be fair though, more people are buying from the company so it’s understandable. But I ordered something over a month ago and it just never arrived. It was the “SHEIN Sweetheart Neck Ruched Bust Puff Sleeve Floral Dress.” I’m not sure what happened but I never got my money back. It’s been about a 3 almost 4 months and my order still has not come in the mail. Also I keep seeing videos on tiktok speaking about fleas and other bugs in their packages which is concerning. Though the clothing quality is much better, and the clothes are considerably nicer, the delivery and packaging issues are ridiculous and need to be fixed.

title: Official Review
text: It’s a official app , they offer coupons on every order when you’re checking out like from 10-20% off. They have very stylish things , I’ve ordered from them about 3 times and I’m going continue, I’ve only had one bad experience where my boyfriend ordered jeans and they didn’t look how they looked on the site, so we decided that jeans for mean from there were a NONO ! Atleast not for the fitted skinny look he was going for.. Everything I’ve ordered has been good , the quality of the material in their clothing isn’t bad at all , it DOESNT STRINK WHEN YOU DRY+ , the Sizes are good fitting as well .. their accessories (glasses,watches,bag,hats) ARE ALLLLLL A HIT NEVER MISS ! And PLUSSS it’s cheap (wholesale price cheap , great for a starting a small boutique) .. I love it I love it I love it .. Shipping from China so expect 2weeks minimum , I’ve received stuff in exactly that time (1 time early than the website said) TRY THEM OUT.

title: Love hate feelings
text: I mean I just love SHEIN! I love looking at clothes and I get so inspired. It’s affordable clothes which is always a win. And yeah I would totally recommend. They don’t just sell clothes but they also sell shoes, accessories, makeup, and so much more. But on the other hand it’s not so great...Of course all apps have their pros and cons. I haven’t had to experience to many bad things except for one. So I had got some clothes and they did fit but they were just to cropped so I returned them. Well I’m in the process of returning and I see a return fee. So I’m like wait a minute and read how much the fee is. 8 DOLLARS! 8 DOLLARS TO RETURN A 4 DOLLAR SHIRT THAT CAME IN 2 WEEKS!!! Look I know some businesses have return fees but considering SHEIN uses child labor, is cheap, and not always the best material, I would not think they would make you pay a return fee. Also they say “free returns in the US” really funny because it’s not😐

title: SO AWESOME
text: I love Shein!! The prices are so amazing, and you get so many coupons! However, they do expire within a week, and usually they’re not too much off. You can get 15% off of orders with high prices lol but there are definitely some good coupons! You can also get points by writing reviews on items you buy and getting likes on your reviews. Points help you take money off of your total! If you have 100 points you save $1. If you have 4000 points, you save $40! Also, they always have really good deals!! There’s always a sale or something’s got some percentage off. There are many categories to choose from! The clothes are very cute. They have pet accessories! Anything you can think of besides food, Shein probably has it. And shipping is only $3!! If your order is over $29, you get free shipping 🥰 Shein is awesome.
